description:
While Tomoki desperately looks for a way to control his raging desire for all things Angeloid, the gang grows more worried that the newest Angeloid to arrive on Earth poses a serious threat to Tomoki’s life!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bombshell! The Angel Is a Big Boob
驚愕! 天使は馬鹿(キョニュウ)だった
